scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('
ðŸ¤– Letta Coding Assistant
');console.log('Main Commands:');console.log('  npm run setup              Create your Letta agent (one-time)');console.log('  npm run assist <path>      Watch + Analyze + Fix + Commit');console.log('  npm run fix <path>         Auto test-fix loop');console.log('  npm run cleanup            Remove old agents');console.log('
Options for assist:');console.log('  --auto-fix                 Auto-apply fixes');console.log('  --auto-commit              Auto-generate commits');console.log('
Examples:');console.log('  npm run assist ../my-project');console.log('  npm run assist C:\Projects\app -- --auto-fix');console.log('');"
